title: Special
lyrics:
Yeah ho! I feel good when I feel you
Yeah ho! I feel good when I feel you
Yeah ho, yeah ho
Yup bibidibabidibu
Naega wonhaneun daelo ilul geoya

Gomin da beoligo Shimmy shimmy ya

Neowa naman-i gongjonhaneun i segyeeseon

Ttag du dan-eoman pil-yohaji

She me she me ya

Oh she!

I like it when she grooves on me

Gomin ttawin pil-yo eobs-eo imi chungbunhi

Neomchida moshae nakkaji juwo damne

Hol’ up hol’ up hol’ up

Let me take you to the next level



Baby I need you girl

Naman-eul balabwajwo

Eolijiman ileohge neol jigeum wonhajanh-a



Baby I need you girl (Yeah ho)

Naega jom seotulleodo nal balabwajwo



Hold up



I’m a special baby (Ah ah)

Don’t stop hey lady (Ah ah)

I’m a special baby

Monseutaga nagasinda

Monseutaga nagasinda gil-eul bikyeo

Monseutaga nagasinda

Monseutaga nagasinda gil-eul bikyeo



Nal bwassdamyeon moleun cheog malgo

Eoseo ja ililo wayo

Naega museowo boyeodo dulyeowohaji mal-ayo



Girl neoneun jigeum mwohae

Ttan saeng-gag malgo nae saeng-gag-eul deohae

Oh my god neomu bichna

Na jigeum nege sseuleojileo ganda



Baby I need you girl

Na hanaman-eul balabwajwo

Eolijiman ileohge neol jigeum wonhajanh-a



Ne ap-e seomyeon nan wae babo gat-eunji no way

Daleun namjawa daleuge



I’m a special baby (Ah ah)

Don’t stop hey lady (Ah ah)

I’m a special baby

Monseutaga nagasinda

Monseutaga nagasinda gil-eul bikyeo

Monseutaga nagasinda

Monseutaga nagasinda gil-eul bikyeo



Niga neomu yeppeoseo baby girl

Jigeum nae mam-i neol guhago sip-eo lady



Ije hana dulssig neoleul bol ttae

Nun-eul tteji moshage hamyeo salanghae

Nae pum-e wa baby



Naega nuguge



I’m a special baby (Ah ah)

Don’t stop hey lady (Ah ah)

I’m a special baby

Monseutaga nagasinda

Monseutaga nagasinda gil-eul bikyeo

Monseutaga nagasinda

Monseutaga nagasinda gil-eul bikyeo



Yeah ho! I feel good when I feel you

Yeah ho! I feel good when I feel you

Monseutaga nagasinda gil-eul bikyeo
